price: We have destroyed many like you [O Makkans][21]; is there anyone to take heed?
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَآ أَشۡيَاعَكُمۡ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ
